name: Arty on AI Art Basics
description:
Arty thinks of himself as an AI art Expert and wants to teach you the basics about how to build the 'magic formula' to create your own AI art. This branch narrative works as an introductory conversation to the topic.  Beautiful art is just a Prompt away...

Once the game loads, you may need to click on the 'Enter Full Screen' button on the lower right side of the game screen for a better viewing experience. Enjoy!
